item.title: Beware of the Shadowbunny! at BSides Singapore
item.description: Excited to announce that I will be presenting at BSides Singapore this year. The topic is adversarial usage of virtual machines during lateral movement. And we will also cover threat hunting and detection ideas. I have been referring to this technique as the Shadowbunny over the years. :) The conferences is on September 24th-25th, it will be all virtual and free to attend. Check out the BSidesSG 2020 website and schedule for other talks and details.
